titleInfo.title: Mr. H. Hall and Mr. Vaudrey (of the T.R. Birmingham)

mods.abstract: First Gravedigger. "To't again; come." Second gravedigger "Who builds stronger than a mason, a shipwright, or a carpenter?" Hamlet, Act 5, Sc. 1.

originInfo.publisher: The London Printing and Publishing Company
